comment: This young pup is SO very handsome , and I was told he is as sweet as can be . I do not understand how he can be on the " Urgent " list ! Just look at that face ! ! I just want to hug him <URL>

comment: I WILL NOT let this pup cross the rainbow bridge . I am seeking a foster near me , as quick as I can , and notified the shelter to inform me of any changes , such as adopter ( hoping for ) or other rescue . So much life ahead for him !
